author: danielsh
msg: * tools/dist/backport.pl: Unbreak compilation on Perl v5.16 and older.

author: markt
msg: Fix file leak. Need to make sure the JarURLConnection is explicitly closed. Leaving it to GC will cause random file locking.

author: gsim
msg: QPID-4710: adjust version checking used by new tx interop tests so as not to fail existing tests when either ptoron python lib is not on path or is 0.7 or earlier
